basic.floral_language:
Impatiens balsamina 
Floriography: beautiful, vivid, charm
Impatiens balsamina is the official flower of the City of Donguan in China. The flower resembles a butterfly with multiple colors, such as white, pink, purple, and red. Leaves green, lanceolate shape. The flower and leaves can be mashed, wrapped around girl's fingernails to paint fresh colors, like henna.
Impatiens balsamina likes ample sunlight, but properly shade in summer. Flowers in June-October with a period flower viewing for 1-2 months.
basic.blooming: Flowering period June-October, viewing period 1-2 months

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, put in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, water daily in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and summer
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
